title: Ed Litton Shop Sale
content:
Ed Litton passed away after a very unfortunate crash on his bicycle last year. Cameron Falconer, one of Ed’s apprentices, is helping sell off Ed’s shop by holding a open house sale. Included are various tools, parts, vintage frames, and more. The sale will be held February 8th and 9th, 9 AM  through 5 PM. The address is:

Litton Cycles
999 W Cutting Blvd
Suite 15
Point Richmond, CA
94804

The post Ed Litton Shop Sale appeared first on The Radavist.
author: John Watson
